name: Chemtrail Attack
description:
You are part of an evil government who tries to influence its citizens with Chemtrails. Some citizens are becoming aware after using face masks for Coronavirus. Your goal is to poison them with your plane without getting destroyed. Fly low and risk everything to poison your rebel citizens. For the glory of your glorious country! :D  

 Instructions:

  • Rotate the plane with the Left and Right cursor keys or A & D. (be gentle, it is a plane not a car!)
  • Fly over the enemies to poison them with your ChemTrails. 
  • They will try to shoot you down, but you can poison them and make them fall out of the platform. (each enemy hit reduces your health by 5%)
  • If you go too far away from the platform you will die. A warning is issued in the UI well ahead.
  • Get tools to heal yourself (each tool heals 20%)

The game is rather easy, but in later waves it can get more complicated.

   Source code of the game available in GitHub:

https://github.com/pauvictor/Chemtrail-attack

  Game can also be played in Windows with shadows! :D

Small game for the "Holistic3D Lockdown Game Jam" #h3dgamejam
